name: Grandview Medical Centre - Family Health Team
comment:
Medical care team focused on family and community health * coordinates patient care in order to assess and treat injuries or illness * team includes family doctors, nurse practitioners, nurses, social workers, registered dieticians, psychiatrists, pharmacists and support staff

Urgent medical care * doctors and nurses assess and treat non-life-threatening injuries or illnesses that cannot wait for a family doctor

description_of_this:
Medical care team focused on family and community health * coordinates patient care in order to assess and treat injuries or illness * team includes family doctors, nurse practitioners, nurses, social workers, registered dieticians, psychiatrists, pharmacists and support staff

Urgent medical care * doctors and nurses assess and treat non-life-threatening injuries or illnesses that cannot wait for a family doctor, Codes: Most services covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Referral: Call for appointment * no referral required
Book an appointment online here, Address: 167 Hespeler Rd, Suite 200, Cambridge, ON, N1R 3H7, Location: lat: 43.381375, lon: -80.319688, Contact: phone: 519-623-4200, fax: 519-623-2546, url: www.gmcfht.ca
